articles.title: EPA approves California rules phasing out diesel trucks - KSBY News
articles.description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency is clearing the way for California rules that will phase out the sale of diesel-powered trucks.
articles.content: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) The Biden administration cleared the way Friday for California's plan to phase out a wide range of diesel-powered trucks, part of the state's efforts to drastically cut planet… [+5651 chars]

articles.title: Why tipping in the United States has gotten out of hand - CNBC
articles.description: Tipping in the United States is on the rise to such a degree that experts call it "tipflation." The social pressure to tip well in front of the tip receiver, before a service is completed, or in front of other customers, encourages the trend, and the pandemic…
